subject: Clay
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal overcame a sore right knee to win his 90th match in 91 attempts on clay, beating Philipp Kohlschreiber by 6-3, 6-3 yesterday to advance to the Mercedes Cup quarterfinals in Stuttgart, Germany. The second-ranked Nadal played with a taped knee and leg and was treated courtside after Kohlschreiber won the first game.
